data.name: BearButtonTooltip
data.value: generate a Bear Toolkit link from the Hunt Helper train recorder.

data.name: SirenButtonTooltip
data.value: generate a Siren Hunts link from the Hunt Helper train recorder data.

data.name: TurtleButtonTooltip
data.value: generate a turtle scouter link from the hunt helper train recorder data.

data.name: TurtleButtonActiveCollabTooltip
data.value: update the turtle collab session with the latest scouted marks in your hunt helper train recorder.

data.name: CopyModeTooltipSummary
data.value: the copy mode that tracker generators will use when generating tracker links.

data.name: CopyModeTooltipLinkDesc
data.value: only copies the generated tracker link to your clipboard

data.name: CopyModeTooltipFullTextDesc
data.value: copies a full-text template to your clipboard, which can contain data about the scouted marks beyond just the tracker link. click on the '?' currently underneath your mouse, to open the SCOUT HELPER settings and configure the template, or open the settings from the Dalamud plugin installer screen.

data.name: ConfigWindowTemplateDesc
data.value: Configure the template used by the full-text copy mode. When the full-text mode is selected, this template is what will be copied to your clipboard, rather than just the generated tracker link. Variables can be referenced by surrounding them with curly braces (e.g. "{link}"), and the following variables are available:

data.name: ConfigWindowTemplateVariables
data.value:
{#} - the number of hunt marks in the train.
{#max} - the maximum possible number of hunt marks in the patch.
{link} - the generated tracker link \(≧▽≦)/
{patch} - the name for the latest patch contained in the recorded train. If there are 6 HW marks and 1 SHB mark in the train, the patch will be SHB.
{patch-emote} - the discord emote for the latest patch contained in the recorded train. If there are 6 HW marks and 1 SHB mark in the train, the patch-emote will be ":5x:".
{tracker} - the name of the tracker used (e.g. "bear").
{world} - the current world you are in. Make sure to use the link generator before you change worlds, if you include this in your template ;P

data.name: ConfigWindowTemplateResetTooltip
data.value: sets the full-text template back to the default value

data.name: TurtleCollabButtonTooltip
data.value: start or join a collaborative scouting session on turtle.

data.name: TurtleCollabButtonActiveTooltip
data.value: click to leave the current session.

data.name: ConfigWindowTweaksInstanceDescription
data.value: configure how many instances there are for each map. this allows users to set the number of instances to the correct values after a new patch change and before scout helper updates with the new values.

data.name: ConfigWindowTweaksInstanceDescriptionNote
data.value: NOTE: once scout helper deploys a new update with the latest patch instance values, any customizations you made here will be reset automatically.

data.name: ConfigWindowTweaksInstanceResetTooltip
data.value: reset all configured instances to the current patch defaults.
